UsernameGeneration.$COMMENT: Get your Username API Key from your username account provider or use .gg/robloxalts to get your key
UsernameGeneration.$COMMENT2: Change this if you are not using AI Generation, this will add a random 6 character string to the back of the Prefix. This will also be used as a fallback if the API returns an error.

$COMMENT: You can change this if you want to use a different provider but version check will still be done on robloxalts servers.
